name: Genuine Fractals Image
summary: An STN file is a scaled image saved in the STiNG format and created by Genuine Fractals, an image editing plug-in for Photoshop. It is a resolution-independent copy of a raster image, allowing it to be scaled without loss of image quality.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Adobe Photoshop with Perfect Resize 7.5 or earlier plugin

macos.display_name: Adobe Photoshop with Perfect Resize 7.5 or earlier plugin
